short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome plugin witch provides a context menu for easy linguee searches

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a chrome plugin which provides a context menu for easy Linguee Translator searches. This plugin is unofficial and has no connection to the firm behind Linguee.
